tasks.label: Install dmd
tasks.command: command -v gdb>/dev/null||echo 'You do not have gdb installed, please install it manually to enable debugging.';if command -v dmd>/dev/null;then echo 'Compiler dmd already installed';exit 0;fi;command -v pacman>/dev/null&&pacman -S dlang&&exit 0;command -v layman>/dev/null&&layman -f -a dlang&&exit 0;command -v brew>/dev/null&&brew install dmd&&exit 0;command -v nix-env>/dev/null&&nix-env -i dmd&&exit 0;command -v apt-get>/dev/null&&sudo apt-get install dmd-compiler&&exit 0;command -v docker>/dev/null&&docker run --rm -ti -v $(pwd):/src dlang2/dmd-ubuntu dmd&&exit 0;command -v zypper>/dev/null&&sudo zypper install dmd&&exit 0;command -v snap>/dev/null&&sudo snap install --classic dmd&&exit 0;echo 'dmd was not found and automatic install was not supported. Please manually install dmd.'

tasks.label: Install ldc
tasks.command: command -v gdb>/dev/null||echo 'You do not have gdb installed, please install it manually to enable debugging.';if command -v ldc2>/dev/null;then echo 'Compiler ldc already installed';exit 0;fi;command -v pacman>/dev/null&&pacman -S ldc&&exit 0;command -v layman>/dev/null&&layman -a ldc&&exit 0;command -v brew>/dev/null&&brew install ldc&&exit 0;command -v nix-env>/dev/null&&nix-env -i ldc&&exit 0;command -v apt-get>/dev/null&&sudo apt-get install ldc&&exit 0;command -v docker>/dev/null&&docker pull dlang2/ldc-ubuntu&&exit 0;command -v zypper>/dev/null&&sudo zypper install ldc&&exit 0;command -v snap>/dev/null&&sudo snap install --classic ldc2&&exit 0;command -v pkg>/dev/null&&pkg install ldc&&exit 0;command -v dnf>/dev/null&&dnf install ldc&&exit 0;command -v choco>/dev/null&&choco install ldc&&exit 0;echo 'ldc was not found and automatic install was not supported. Please manually install ldc.'
